title: My Unspoken Addiction & How I Changed My Relationship with God
description: Hi everyone! In today's episode, I am getting HONEST about some things. Things I have not really admitted to many before. Addiction, confusion, bad habits, bad friends, ill intentions, and more. I also speak about how I truly realized that my habits were only pulling me away from God, and how I found Christ again after living a double life.  Jeanine's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/ --- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/support
dc:creator: Jeanine Amapola
